warning: `ctype` is deprecated in Edition 2023
  --> testdata/options/validate/ctype_2023.proto:20:21
   |
15 | edition = "2023";
   |           ------ edition specified here
...
20 |     string foo = 1 [ctype = STRING];
   |                     ^^^^^

20 | -     string foo = 1 [ctype = STRING];

  --> testdata/options/validate/ctype_2023.proto:22:21

   |           ------ edition specified here
...
21 |     string bar = 2 [ctype = CORD];
